name: Race Of Rally [DEMO]
description:
Download Link Below!

Race Of Rally is a Rally Game that developed by Arek Creative. This game has a Rally and Arcade theme. In this game you will feel how to be a rally racer who will break the record for the fastest rally racer!

This demo is still in the development stage so the features in it are still in progress and there will be many surprises in the Full Release Version.

Features :

- 2 Tracks

- Racing in Realistic Environments

- High Resolution Texture's and Sounds

- Cinematics in each Environments

- Can be played with Gamepad/Controller and PC/Laptop

My YouTube Channel : Arek Creative
